portfolio-2022.name: This website
portfolio-2022.description: This website was made using a Preact +  TypeScript starter template. It utilizes Tailwind CSS and Daisy UI for styled components.
portfolio-2022.imgAlt: screenshot of 8-bit multicolored sunset from portfolio homepage
portfolio-2022.subDescription1: I used Preact as a lightweight alternative to React ( 3.5kb vs. 135kb in size). Plus, it makes it easy to enable pre-rendering for SEO.
portfolio-2022.subDescription2: I used this framework for ease of used. DaisyUI's and Kitwind.io's libraries made it easy to generate great looking and responsive components.
portfolio-2022.subDescription3: All projects data is stored in a single JSON of key/values.
portfolio-2022.subDescription4:
Google Lighthouse measured the following scores across the app:
 90 Performance,
 100 Accessibility,
 85 Best Practices,
 100 SEO

advertise-with-us.name: Advertise With Us
advertise-with-us.description: A vanilla html website that provides a free service to find media vendors, programs or categories.
advertise-with-us.imgAlt: screenshot of product info from Advertise With Us
advertise-with-us.subDescription1: HTML+JS is delivered via SSR .jsp servlet technology to securely withhold API key.
advertise-with-us.subDescription2: Tailwind CSS was useful in generating predefined media queiries for collapsible components.
advertise-with-us.subDescription3: JSON-LD, sitemaps and other features provided for enhanced SEO.
advertise-with-us.subDescription4:
Google Lighthouse measured the following scores across the app:
 98 Performance,
 97 Accessibility,
 100 Best Practices,
 100 SEO

sonar-strike.name: Sonar Strike
sonar-strike.description: Prototype Underwater Shooter. High-speed  space shooter game made in entirely in React and JavaScript. Final project for JSCRIPT-300, React front-end development course.
sonar-strike.imgAlt: Starting page of gameplay with sonar blasting dolping on a tropical island background
sonar-strike.subDescription1: This was cloned from another game. I updated the game mechanics, styling, and menu navigation to create an entirely new look and feel.
sonar-strike.subDescription2: All game logic is written in JS.
sonar-strike.subDescription3: Gameplay only features one static level and type of enemy. It is not playable on certain devices.
sonar-strike.subDescription4: If you can keep clicking fast enough, it's pretty hard to lose!
